Material used.Description: Fibroblasts from patients with PINK1 mutation and healthy controls were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced mitochondrial respiratory activity, altered respiratory control ratio, and increased reliance on glycolysis for ATP production in patient fibroblasts compared to controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly stated in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly stated in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly stated in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard mitochondrial respiratory activity (e.g., ATP production via oxidative phosphorylation) in healthy controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant reduction in respiratory activity and altered respiratory control ratio compared to healthy controls.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cytochrome c content and oxidase activity measurement

Material used.Description: Fibroblasts from patients with PINK1 mutation and healthy controls were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced cytochrome c content and decreased cytochrome c oxidase activity in patient fibroblasts compared to controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard cytochrome c content and oxidase activity in healthy controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant reduction in cytochrome c content and oxidase activity compared to healthy controls.
